bookSourceGroup: 🔭 其他,🎊 常用,🎨 漫画
exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var host = `{{Get('url')}}`;
'[{title:"更新",url:"' + host + '/page/{{page}}/",style:{layout_flexGrow:1}},{title:"上架",url:"' + host + '/newmanga/page/{{page}}/",style:{layout_flexGrow:1}},{title:"连载",url:"' + host + '/on-going/page/{{page}}/",style:{layout_flexGrow:1}},{title:"完结",url:"' + host + '/end/page/{{page}}/",style:{layout_flexGrow:1}}]';
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/123.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>
loginUi:
[
  { name: "激活码：", type: "text" },
  { name: "代理：", type: "text" },
  {
    name: "            💡　　 源　　 站　　 更　　 新　　 💡            ",
    type: "button",
    action: "update()"
  },
  { name: "  查看当前  ", type: "button", action: "look(0)" },
  { name: "   查看历史   ", type: "button", action: "look(1)" },
  { name: "  恢复默认  ", type: "button", action: "test(0)" },
  { name: "  繁体搜索  ", type: "button", action: "search_TC()" },
  { name: "   简繁转换   ", type: "button", action: "TC_to_SC()" },
  { name: "  目录整理  ", type: "button", action: "settle()" },

  { name: "                      ༺ˇ»`ʚ  点击切换源站  ɞ´«ˇ༻                     ", type: "button" },
  { name: "  ①巴卡①  ", type: "button", action: "$(1)" },
  { name: "   ②巴卡②   ", type: "button", action: "$(2)" },
  { name: "  ③巴卡③  ", type: "button", action: "$(3)" },

  {
    name: "            💡　　 源　　 站　　 打　　 印　　 💡            ",
    type: "button",
    action: "test()"
  }
]

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
eval(String(source.loginUrl)); var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl)); var Option = { "method": "GET", "headers": Headers }; if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") { var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result); var $1 = element => java.getElements(element); var $2 = element => String(java.getElements(element).text()); var $3 = element => String(J.select(element).attr('src')); url = baseUrl; s = '★ ' + String($1('.summary-heading:contains(评分) + .summary-content').select('#averagerate').text()).replace(/分/g, '') + ',' + $2('.summary-heading:contains(状态) + .summary-content').replace(/Completed/g, '完结').replace(/OnGoing/g, '连载'); k = $2('.summary-heading:contains(类型) + .summary-content') + ',' + $2('.summary-heading:contains(标籤) + .summary-content').replace(/\,\s/g, ','); t = String($1('.chapter-release-date')[0].text()).replace(/ago/g, '前').replace(/[年月]/g, '-').replace(/日/g, '').replace(/\s/g, ''); l = $1('.wp-manga-chapter a')[0].text(); l = String(l); l = Get('settle') == true ? l.replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, l.match(/\d+/) ? l.match(/(\d+)/)[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : l; Setting = '\n📌当前源站：' + (Get('ci0') == 0 ? '〖默认〗' : '〖自选〗') + x[Get('ci0')] + (Get('url').length > 26 ? Get('url').substring(0, 26) + "
" + Get('url').substring(26) : Get('url')) + ('\n🔍繁体搜索：' + (Get('search_TC') == true ? '〖自选〗开启' : '〖默认〗关闭')) + ('\n📑简繁转换：' + (Get('TC_to_SC') == true ? '〖默认〗开启' : '〖自选〗关闭')) + ('\n🗃目录整理：' + (Get('settle') == true ? '〖自选〗开启' : '〖默认〗关闭')); changeLog = '\nㅤ\nㅤ\n' + Setting + '\nㅤ\n'; book = JSON.stringify({ 'name': $2('#manga-title'), 'author': $2('.author-content').replace(/\,/g, '/'), 'kind': String(s + ',' + k).replace(/^(.{36}).*/, '$1'), 'word': '', 'latest': l + '〔' + t + '〕', 'intro': (t != '' ? ('更新时间：' + t + '\nㅤ\n') : '') + String($1('.post-content_item:contains(简介)').text()).replace(/简介：/g, '').replace(/(^)/g, '$1
') + changeLog, 'cover': $3('.summary_image img'), 'url': url, 'durl': '', 'reName': true }); } else { (function Book() { apiBaseUrl = cache.get(`cache_api_${Get('url')}`); json = java.ajax(apiBaseUrl); Title = JSON.parse(json)['title']; Intro = JSON.parse(json)['intro']; return { Title: Title, Intro: Intro }; }()); book = JSON.stringify({ 'kind': book['kind'], 'latest': Title[Title.length - 1], 'intro': Intro[0] }); } Put(book);

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if(result.includes('no-js')){
    cookie.removeCookie(Get('url'));
    java.setContent(java.startBrowserAwait(baseUrl + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option),"验证").body());
}
if (User == true) {
    var list = java.getElements('.col-6.col-md-2.badge-pos-1');
    for (i in list) {
        data.push({
            'name': list[i].select('.h5').text(),
            'author': '',
            'kind': '★ ' + list[i].select('.total_votes.font-meta.score').text(),
            'word': '',
            'latest': list[i].select('.btn-link').text() + '〔' + String(list[i].select('.post-on.font-meta').text()).replace(/ago/g, '前').replace(/[年月]/g, '-').replace(/日/g, '').replace(/\s/g, '') + '〕',
            'intro': '',
            'cover': list[i].select('.img-responsive').attr('src'),
            'url': list[i].select('.item-thumb.c-image-hover a').attr('href')
        });
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page\/(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page/' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
    if (!list[0] || !next_1.select('.col-6.col-md-2.badge-pos-1')[0]) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

            'author': String(list[i].select('.nofloat.mg_author.post-content_item .summary-content').text()).replace(/\,\s/g, '/'),
            'kind': '★ ' + list[i].select('.total_votes.font-meta.score').text() + ',' + String(list[i].select('.nofloat.mg_status.post-content_item .summary-content').text()).replace(/Completed/g, '完结').replace(/OnGoing/g, '连载') + ',' + list[i].select('.nofloat.mg_genres.post-content_item .summary-content').text(),
            'word': '',

        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

var Link = '';

    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") {
    var list = java.getElements('.wp-manga-chapter');
    date = String(java.getElements('.chapter-release-date')[0].text()).replace(/ago/g, '前').replace(/[年月]/g, '-').replace(/日/g, '').replace(/\s/g, '');
    for (i = list.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
        title = list[i].select('a').text();
        order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
        title = Get('settle') == true ? String(title).replace(/\s共.*?图/, '').replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, ' ').replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : title;
        data.push({
            'title': i == 0 ? title + '〔' + date + '〕' : title,
            'link': list[i].select('a').attr('href'),
            'time': String(list[i].select('span').text()).replace(/ago/g, '前').replace(/[年月]/g, '-').replace(/日/g, '').replace(/\s/g, '')
        });
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data1();
}
Put(data);
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    java.put(Get('url') + "searchkey", e);
    return Get('url') + '/page/{{page}}/?s=' + e + '&post_type=wp-manga';
}(key));
</js>
